name: The Refenestration of Prague
description:
In the year 1618, two Catholic nobles and their secretary were pushed out of a third story window. All three survived, either due to divine intervention or a well-placed pile of dung, depending on whom you ask.

This, the Second Defenestration of Prague (never mind the first one, it's a long story), sparked the Thirty Years War, a massive conflict between European Protestants and Catholics.

Stanislaus is determined to prevent that war. He sees the way that Bohemia is divided against itself and has a plan to stop it. But can anything be done to rebuild trust and give Bohemia a fresh start?

5/6/17 Version 1.1 - Better but still not perfect kerning! Slight text clarifications! No more blur effect!
